body_html:
@girving So far it seems like output is not split into new lines if it is very large (roughly over ~65000 characters it seems). I will look at splitting output by newlines in our code.

For now, you can try running api_compatibility_test with --update_goldens and then look at the golden file diffs. See https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/api/tests/README.txt

body:
@girving So far it seems like output is not split into new lines if it is very large (roughly over ~65000 characters it seems). I will look at splitting output by newlines in our code.

For now, you can try running api_compatibility_test with --update_goldens and then look at the golden file diffs. See https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/api/tests/README.txt
